Pre-Game Insights: West Indies are poised to seek redemption in the T20 World Cup 2024, leveraging their star-studded squad and exploiting the advantage of playing on home turf.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between West Indies and Papua New Guinea would be their first-ever meeting in the 20-over format.
Spinners have exhibited supremacy at the Providence Stadium, maintaining an economy rate of just 6.94 in the 24 T20Is played since 2022.
Others: The match is scheduled to commence on June 2, at 8 pm IST (Indian Standard Time).
Viewers will be able to catch the match broadcasted on the Star Sports Network.
Users can watch the match on the Disney+Hotstar (app and website).
